content.detailedDescription:
I was at home and went outside around 10:30pm to make a call and as always, i look up at the sky. i caught something out of the corner of my eye and turned to face it. i thought it was an aircraft at first since im airline crew.

as, i continued to study the aircraft, i realized it wasnt making any sound, had no lights. it appeared to by gliding about 500 feet up and was reflecting the orange glow of the street lights. 

i became anxious and excited as i watched the object disappear behind the trees. i wanted to see more.
content.summary: The object looked like a boomerang and emitted no sound

content.detailedDescription:
After coming out of a compline that was given by benedictine monks in weston vermont last evening, my wife observed what she thought was a plane behaving in an erratic fashion, moving back and forth in a north to south direction. when she mentioned this to me, the object was flying in a straight line manner from east to west. the object had 3 pulsating lights that glowed a reddish yellow, all at the same time. 
 the object looked like a boomerang and flew pretty much over our heads. 
the object did not appeared to be between 500 and 1000 feet over our heads and disappeared in a westerly direction. 
the night was clear with many stars evident.
there was no breeze, and the temperature was in the mid-60's. 
the sighting was about 8:30 pm, and lasted approximately 5 to 10 minutes.
content.summary: My wife and i saw 3 pulsating reddish yellow lights coming from an easterly direction.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a condo on the first floor overlooking a small lake. i usually sit on my screened-in porch every night to watch planes. i live fairly close to two airports and i've enjoyed watching planes since i was a child. the sighting
of this object actually took me by surprise a little because there was no sound. if i hadn't been watching for planes i never would have seen it. when i saw it my immediate reaction was ufo because it was like nothing i had ever seen before. the whole sighting lasted no more than about 4 seconds. there were no running lights, no sound and the shape unlike any plane. it was very large, a boomerang-type shape but with more rounded edges, (i think 5) very white but dim lights on the underside which seemed to illuminate the craft. without the lights i would not have been able to see it because it was the same color as the night sky and was very camouflaged, almost transparent-looking. it made no sound at all and looked like it was gliding more than flying through the air. it flew from left to right heading in a southeasterly direction, moving parallel to my porch. i lost sight of it when it went behind the trees on our property. for a while i remained on the porch looking for it, hoping it would come back. it did cross my mind at one point that perhaps it was an experimental aircraft headed towards macdill air force base which is in the direction it was flying. it certainly seemed to have stealth-like technology and almost appeared as if it was cloaked. the longer i stayed on my porch watching the skies the more apprehensive i became and decided to come in the house. my heart was pounding, i was shaking and it took me a while to calm myself down.
content.summary: Same color as night sky,dim lights but very white, gliding, almost transparent, visible only because of glow from lights on underside, silent, moved slowly

content.detailedDescription: [this account is entered by state director r. howard based on direct witness testimony via facebook and telephone.] i caught this on my security camera 10/13/2014 @ 8:55 pm to 9:01pm. (in the attached image, the light is visible in the upper left corner of the screen.) i have never seen anything like this...I did not see this with my own eyes: i had to look for it on the video after my neighbor called me and told me about it. my neighbor said he saw a light that was flashing with red, green, and white. these weren't aviation lights on a normal aircraft. due to my vision issues typing a longer account is difficult, but i'd be willing to speak with someone about this. i do not know if my neighbor would be willing to, however. i have the entire unaltered mp4 video, about 7 minutes, and will provide it to mufon. though i did not see this, both the camera, and my friend, did see it: he saw the video and states that it does capture what he saw. always a skywatcher, i have never seen anything like this and i would really like to know what it was.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Friend saw light flashing alternating red/green/white; then called, it is there on security cam footage.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i were driving east on carnaby loop toward river oaks rd on october 8th, at approx. 8:30pm. i noticed a large yellow-orange light, which i at first thought was a roman candle firework being shot off above the treeline,(possibly over the intercoastal waterway or ocean), but it remained in the sky and immediately two more yellow-orange lights appeared in a row next to it. next, another yellow-orange light appeared next to the set of three lights, and then spanned out to form another set/row of three lights to the right of the first set of three. then, another group of three yellow-orange lights appeared in a row to the left of the first three. all nine lights (three sets of three) made a straight line. the lights hovered and pulsated. finally, a single yellow-orange light appeared above and to the left of the line of nine lights. they all remained hovering/stationary for about 5-7 seconds (?), and then all 10 lights disappeared at the same time, almost as though they were sucked backwards and snuffed out. the whole thing took about 1-2 minutes. both my daughter and i knew without a doubt that we had just witnessed something out of the ordinary. it made our hair feel like it was standing on end and gave us goose bumps. we sat there for a few minutes afterward trying to process and makes sense of what we just saw. it was surreal!

the pattern the lights formed were like this:

          *

        ***  ***  ***
content.summary: 3 sets of 3 lights in straight line and 1 light above which was pulsating/ hovering

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work on evening shift at a coal plant located at winifrede hollow road. it was 2200 at night. the plant was down and there was no noises anywhere.Me and 9 other guys had just finished doing pipe repair and were standing outside leaning against trucks.
one of the guys pointed up and said what is that.We all looked up an saw a triangle shaped object outlined in white lights the size of a football field coming up the hollow from sw [beckley, wv area].It might have been 300 to 500 ft above us. it was moving very slow and made no noise.We watched for about 3 or 4 minutes  as it disappeared over the trees. a few minutes latter another one showed up behind it, the same shape and size and no noise. another one showed up after that, same as before. after these 3 went by a small object with lots of red flashing appeared at the end of the line formation.
they were all headed nw towards charleston, wv.
what was strange about the objects was that there was no noises whatsoever, to be as close as they were,and their sizes. all of this took place in 15 minutes.
content.summary: 3 triangle shaped objects,each the size of a football field outlined in white lights in line and 1 smaller with red flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba en la casa en la terraza estaba haciendo ejercicio y estendiendo ropa,
2 me gusta ver para el volcan todos los dias y mas ese dia q estaba mas despejado por eso ote el objeto
3 un punto 
4 parecia un lucero o como una luz de un avion pero cuando empezo a cambiar y a parpadear mas rapido dije eso no es un avion y menos un lucero moviendose asi
5 me gusto ver eso porq eso es lo q quiero q la gente se de cuenta q dios no nos hizo solo a nosotroslos (seres humanos) 
6 se empezo a desvanecer y luego se desaparecio de una.
content.summary: Me quede viendo encima del volcan una luz q parpadeaba y se movia en forma diferente a un avion

content.detailedDescription:
Not a cloud in the sky. sitting on south-facing deck, enjoying beautiful autumn weather.  i'm retired, so i do this often, day and night.  no other aircraft in sky at this time, neither general, commercial, or military.  university of oklahoma's national weather service launches weather balloons, which i have seen often and mostly appear motionless except for the instrument packages dangling wildly beneath on their tether.  this was nothing of the sort.

at upper left limit of vision, noticed something traveling at a very high rate of speed.  immediately recognized it as something far beyond the "norm', and immediately rose from my chair, moved to south edge of deck, realizing that it would quickly leave my observation when it passed beyond  my roof top.

its heading was very near 360, and its path was approximately above i-35, which is about 3/4 mile to my east.  its altitude, a guess, was about 2,000 to 3000 feet. its speed, a guess, was at least 600 knots, or traversing the sky at least triple the rate of commercial airliners as they level out into landing patterns for okc. shape appeared spherical ... color and texture was similar to a cloud. so, i saw a small cloud, maybe 40' in diameter, traveling near the speed of sound ... making no sound.  before it passed from view, it made 2 very quick "zig-zags", moving right and then immediately forward, in less time than it takes to quickly say “zig-zag” twice.  it then continued on its 360 heading.
content.summary: Moved very rapidly with 2 quick "zig-zags" near end of observation.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was at my house and i was just trying to take a photo because i enjoyed the view and i thought it would make a good photo then i took a photo and later on saw what could be alien ships in the photo. i was at the time just going to school and going on with my daily life.I first noticed the object while looking back at the photo i took and i thought just to look at the photos then looking more closely at he sky i saw the ships. immediately after seeing what was in my photo i thought it was aliens in their ships in formations and possibly a cylindrical flying object. the objects are black and grey and they are saucer type objects and they would appear to be hovering and in formation. i am very excited about what i saw later on in my photo and was unsure what to think about it. i have tried to contact a news station about my photo but it didn't help prove what is in the photo. i did not see the object in anything but my phone and didn't loose sight of it. if given proper credit i can show the real photo. if i am contacted and know someone can find out whats in my photo i will share it.
content.summary: I took a photo and found shapes in the sky possible alien

content.detailedDescription: stopped to take a sunset picture. when i went to review the pictures i saw that there was a solid red orb near the trees with a large red aura around it. the next picture had shown that the orb had moved from the trees to the rocks below with the aura around it. when i looked over to try to relocate the orb i could not find it. i felt it was a connection from the cosmos because i have that connection and will be sending you more evidence of other events.
content.summary: I reviewed some sunset pictures and found a solid red orb moved from the trees to rocks below.

content.detailedDescription:
I am an amateur photographer who enjoys to take landscapes of fields with rolled hay because shows distance, depth of field and scale to make enlargements. i took about 8 photos on this day and bingo. i did not see when i was taking photo because glare, sunny day, obscures my view of 2"x3" rear screen of the camera at the time. long story short, i was wanting to take 8 or so photos which fills my internal digital camera memory then go home and u/l to my computer. this i did do to. in shot 6 of the 8 i saw something. only noticed it later and not at the time of the photo.
i magnified best i could to rule out bugs, birds, dirt, something on the lens, etc. it appears to me to be in the air, and something solid. really this is all i know. but, at the same time it seems to have symmetry and as though it were a craft. maybe moving very fast possibly in my general direction. that could of passed unseen, unheard, unobserved otherwise over head. or, hovering in the distance not enough info, detail in an unfurther scrutinized or analyzed digital photo. all i can say except that it really seems to be a solid craft to me, is all.
content.summary: Just on one of photos of hay bales in field. unmistakably, object in air?

content.detailedDescription: When i first saw the object it was one month ago.Then it returned..It had a long smoke ring like trail..Weird..It was huge..I only had my iphone not my camcorder,i got good footage of its speed.And let me tell you,this thing banked at bonecrushing velocity..It was definitely gray and some white to it.I don't have the correct zoom on my phone but it went directly over me as i filmed and i saw it clearly..It made my blood run cold..I thought it was a high tech enemy aircraft that was on a bombing mission.The second time i saw it,it was even creepier.It acted like it own the skies..Traveling over the city at about 3000 ft or so doing turns that would do much damage to a normal human being..Maybe it ours or maybe its someone elses.But i cant stop thinking about it and if it isn't ours that's scary.It could easily out run what we have.No doubt about it.I think its worth looking into.I cant stop looking up now...Jack
content.summary: Grey triangled.Huge.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking a some property with a realtor when a plane caught our attention. an object that looked like it had a tail fell from the sky, we thought it was something dropped from the plane then it hovered and shot off to the right then to the left at speed i have never encountered. the object had a tail at first which made me thing it was a chute to be deployed then that disappeared and the orb hovered then made its movements. the orb move very quickly and seemed to blink in and out of view and then while reviewing my footage, it came into view for fractions of a second and was gone, i didn't know i had captured it until i froze each farm. not having hardware i could not isolate the image making it hard to follow in the video. the object in the video appears about 1 inch from the top right of screen and defends to about 2.5 inches above the left corner in the 22 second range. hard to detect without some way to freeze it moment by moment.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Looked like something dropped from the plane then relized it hovered after dropping then excess sped in different direction

content.detailedDescription: My cousin is the one who always sees them, she gets a feeling the will go out to her backyard and shooting pictures and always grabs something. sometimes it can't be seen with the naked eye but it will appear in the pictures, other times they're visible with the naked eye. she says that most times they move from cloud to cloud. also sometimes they emit a light and just disappeared.
content.summary: Usually appear when airforce jets pass

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch looking that the sky and saw a black boomerang craft fly from south west to north east over my position. i was seeing these same craft last year starting september 30 2013. i was extremely excited to see them back. speed was maybe 500 mph and completely silent. after seeing the first one fly over i yelled for my roomates to come look and a second one flew over going the opposite direction. very hard to see and almost easier using your peripheral vision. i want to know what these are badly! last year we saw these crafts fly over my house about 35 times over a month and a half. it amazes me that airplanes aren't seeing these! i contacted many different ufo groups and none have come to see or taken any interest at all. i don't think these are human made. anyway please contact me if your interested. [email removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Black boomerang with faint round lights on wings. i saw two last night. minutes apart

content.detailedDescription:
Absolute beautiful clear cool morning.I was stopped at red light facing east. while looking up,very high in altitude i focused my attention on a white looking orb moving rather quickly heading in a more southeastern path. while trying to determine if what is was seeing was a bird or something else, i observed another identical orb that was traveling faster than the 1st one and it was traveling in a more southern direction. i kept my eyes focused on both of them trying to figure out if it was iss or satellites and shortly after they both disappeared. i have seen the iss at night time and have an understanding that it moves rather quickly and in a straight path. these objects had similar characteristics but the second one had a completely different direction and was moving faster! after i began to process what i was seeing my 1st thought was the video i saw from someone's phone who was on a flight and they videoed two orbs that were traveling at a high rate of speed and one passed the other but they were on a similar path. the other anomoly was a circular vortex that appeared in the clouds prior to the orbs being seen in the video.
if i had to  to guess i was looking at the orbs and they were between 60 to 70 degrees from the horizin.
content.summary: 2 white orbs one faster than the other traveling in different direction

content.detailedDescription: My english is weak so i write in hindi. mai ne 14/10/14 ka v ake report file kiya hai ye v ausi tarah ka hai aaj  7:30 ke karib mai ne aur meri sister ne ye sab dekha  aaj w se ne me lagatar 3 ufo gaye ake ake kar k  2-2m ke gap me aur ake bar w me ake orange light kafi dark sine ki aur gayab ho gai aur lat ufo mai ne  ws me dekha. mujhe jaan hai hai ki kya wo satellites the ya ufo pr wo ake he line me gaye w se ne tak fir gayab ho gaye.Thank you
content.summary: Look like a satellite

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my car driving to school at chatt state drinking coffee and eating a chicken biscuit from mcdonalds. as soon as i rounded the bend (the exit right before the amnicola exit headed towards soddy daisy) i saw a triangle shaped craft hovering at an unknown distance in the air off the interstate. it wasn't moving at all and had a bright light underneath it that was white orange/ sort of yellow. i saw it and tried to take a picture of it but it was too high up and there was traffic at my exit. at this time there were no clouds in the sky, just this strange object. i finished driving to school and figured that maybe it was a kite or something that had gotten loose. however when i got to the school i looked and it was still hovering, it still hadn't moved. i played sort of a creepy move but i needed to make sure i wasn't seeing things so i talked to a girl what was walking by and told her to look in that direction and tell me what she saw. she saw it too and did answer that it wasn't moving and that she didn't know what it was, but she didn't seem to disturbed by it. however that does mean i wasn't imagining things, and there really was some sort of stationary craft high above chattanooga today. i went inside for class and came out about 50 minutes later, there was now dense cloud cover in the area and i also saw fresh trails from planes laid in the exact area that i had seen the strange craft. 

as soon as i saw the object i knew it wasn't a plane or a helicopter, as i keep my eyes to the sky as often as i can for this very reason.
content.summary: Stationary triangle with flame like lighting near the dam off amnicola hwy.

content.detailedDescription: On the way out to the barn tonight, in the southern sky a little to the east, i noticed a stationary spot in the sky, alternating red, blue, white, a single source, not like a plane's lights, although that's what i thought it must be. there are lots of planes in the sky at night, see those all the time, but this was different. i noticed it wasn't moving...Or if it appeared to move, was in very small circles...Got out the binoculars, held them as steady as i could against a tree, and watched this thing for over 15 minutes, and it never really seemed to move, the lights just kept oscillating red, blue, white. then, in a %$#& instant, and i mean, in a half-second, it became a pinpoint, way far off. i could barely make it out, but could still see a faint color change taking place, unlike the stars around it. tried to keep focused on it, but it disappeared or i lost track of it. stayed out there for a while hoping for another look, but the clouds moved in. it was somewhere between aspirin-sized and star-sized when the event began, ended up being star-sized before disappearing.
content.summary: Pulsating stationary red/blue/white single source for 15 min, then incredible acceleration

content.detailedDescription:
On my way to drive some country lanes and as i crested a hill i saw it hovering above farley mount monument. it was huge and i mean big. asif it was skyscraper size all light up with at least thirty rows of lights sending beams of light in all directions. it appeared to be metallic in construction. narrow at the base wide at the top and bulging in roundness. it did not move but wasnt still as if it was keeping itself there. maybe tiny movements of adjustment. it made no noise maybe a hum. i could not hear any animals. i watched for six minutes and decided to leave feeling unsure whether it had just happened. 
the following morning i went to work at the bank and a young lad came in and said he had deen a ufo over cheesefoot head the previous night.I immediately told him to shut up and go draw me a pic of what he has seen. i did the same and when we bought the pics together they wrre thr same. i have told a few people but no one seems to take me seriously.
i have recently been doing some research on crop circles and wonder if my sighting hss znything to do with the binary codes crop circle of crabwood?
content.summary: Upside down cone but realy big at least 1000ft high

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

sorry, i dont have time. i will only info add. 

you know add this point on the map, because i see many " ufo " around my home. and some "ufo" and seen my friends.

this is some points gps. (here was the besst off objekts)

(i send only sample pictures, because i have deleted the data once google  or microsoft)  
original video and pictures i have archived. 

and more..
content.summary: Moving ship, live steel, illuminating

content.detailedDescription:
My partner, daughter and i were out in the yard doing some cleanup of leaves. we were all standing and talking in the driveway when i looked behind the 2 and up into the sky. i saw a huge, white, glowing object in the sky with a misty, white tail trailing behind it. my first thought was that is odd, planes don't have a short vapor trail, it should be longer. i also realized it was making no sound. 

i called attention to it by telling the other 2 to look, look at that. is that a comet? would we see a comet in the daylight? it was 5:23 in the `evening. it was clear, sunny and cloudless oct 12,2014. we all began to watch it as it went from sw to se toward the ocean. it crossed across the face of the sun and we thought we'd lost sight of it. it had not disappeared.

it stopped and hovered for about 15-30 seconds then resumed moving across the sky, lowering toward the ocean as it went. we watched until it went out of sight due to trees that were in the way. we were excited thinking oh this is haley's comet. my partner kept saying, no that is a ufo, i just know it.

the object seemed to flutter a bit and fly, then hover and fly. some of it's flight was quick, some quite slow as it arced closer toward the water. `in the sky it appeared to be larger than a basketball with what, from the ground, would have been about a 4 inch tail.

we came indoors and about 15 minutes later we heard several large helicopters fly over the house in the direction of searsport maine and the water. penobscot bay. we live in a town next to searsport, about a 1/3 mile away from the bay.
content.summary: Saw huge white orb with a short misty white trail flew stopped, hovered, flew again lowering toward ocean. lost sight after 8 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
Iwas out walking my dog 1am in morning next to trailer park where i lived. i saw object 20ft in front of me i kept staring at it. it looked about 7ft tall just a shadow i could make out
i was getting ready to walk to my left to go back to my trailer about 50ftto left was railroad tracks i had to cross to get home.To my surprise standing in front of me was a large wolfe. the wolfe was eating something so i looked to my left and right to see what was qoinq on. to my suprise i wasn't where i was supposed to be i was in a very large field like only thing i could see was tall looking grass
so i looked too see where wolf was he was gone.I was standing in this field of grass not having a clue where i was all i know is i was frozen in a state of mind i couldn't move
i felt like i was hovering above the ground not actually on the ground
i could see the grass moving and i could hear a swisshing sound.I had to get out of there so i turned to my left and started walking. the next thing i saw was i was back to my place. i turned to look back and i didn't see the place i had been.I went home and wrote myself a note to say this didn't happen. the note was on the table when i woke up the next day.I never went over to the area after that i moved 6 months later.I do not have pictures.
content.summary: I was in field next to trailer park saw apparitton in front of me i was in another place not where i was supposed to be things started happening very scary.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Wo pahle to ake aeria me eidher audher ja raha tha fir adhe ghante baad wo mere ghar ke auper se se gaya ausme red,orange light qo zigzag chal raha tha wo triangle shape ka tha
content.summary: Hindi- ake chota sa lithe tha jo ki aasaman me eidher audhr ja raha tha karib 30m tak

content.detailedDescription:
At around 9:15-9:20 pm mst/arizona time while walking dog, i caught a view of an object that was first thought to be a plane with blinking red and green navigational lights. i turned away from the object due to thinking it nothing more than that many planes that fly over due to living in flight path of local major airport (sky harbor). it wasn't until i turned back a minute later did i notice that the object took on flight characteristics not like that of a conventional commercial plane.

it began to make a hard turn to the west from the south west direction it came but not at a complete 90 degrees. it then began to ascend and descend at differing diagonal vertical paths until finally seeming to hover an then jet off back in a se direction. once it did this it than began to hover in that area for a time of perhaps 33-45 seconds (according to attempted cellular video of the object). after doing so it than began to descend to a point where i could not see it and began to run around the building in my apartment to try and see if i could get a final view. i wasn't able to other than see it descend down in a se direction and disappear.

i was quite anxious, excited, nervous and really at a lost to come to a thought of what i just saw. i thought perhaps it could be a helicopter but the movements it made before jetting to the se was like that of one randomly moving a cursor on a computer and not something you'd expect of a plane or helicopter.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red/green lights like navigational lights on a commercial aircraft but then started to flutter around in different paths before leaving.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on the porch with my boyfriend smoking a ciggerette & we saw these bright white lights in a row. then they turned red & blue & it was flying straight then made a sharp u turn, then was flying in a figure 8. & every time it turned it was diagonal & u cud see the diamond 3d shape it was. & the craft was very dark, looked kind of black. then after that one flew over the building i was at they started just appearing all over flying all different directions. & they wud speed up toward the mountain & disappear in the mountain. & about a minute later over to the right side of the mountain they wud shoot up into the sky really fast. changing light colors & formation. from a single blinking red light to a long line of super bright white lights flashing. at the same time there were yellow orange huge balls of light hovering & then start floating straight up really high until they just dissappered. i stayed out there with my boyfriend & 2 friend for 3 hours watching. & they are still out there now.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Over 14, appearing & disappering, landing & taking off spontaneously. shape shifting

content.detailedDescription: At first, i saw what i thought was an airplane or jet, that seemed to have come from the east.  i saw one craft, with a rose colored light at the top, & blue, white, greenish lights below it in a line, which made it appear triangular from my vantage point.  i feel as if there was more to the craft which i couldn't distinguish due to the fact there was a mist/high humidity/low hanging clouds: the lights of the craft caught the mist and made a glow in this mist.  i've lived near small, regional airports since i was 8 yrs old, & have never seen anything with this shape.  as i looked at it, i realized there was another, slightly above & off to the right of it.  at first, they were just hovering in place, for about 20 seconds.  then, i saw another appear out of the east, but it "blinked" to a new location, remaining at about the same height as the others, but instantaneously appearing in a new location to the south/west of the first two.  at this point, i went & got my friend to come take a look, hoping he could explain to me what i was seeing.  he & i observed the three objects, & noted another had joined the third one, & was moving near it in the sky.  we both then saw a super bright white "comet", which appeared out of the sky between the pairs of crafts, almost like a shooting star, but it had appeared out of nowhere, and its "tail" was much shorter, and was instantly gone.  we then realized that there were now 5 crafts, all identical, & that they were moving from place to place super fast, as if in a blink or pulse.  they all appeared in the south/west for a few minutes, with one of the original two remaining in the east a minute or two longer, then all appeared in one area in the south, then they were gone.  no bright flash, no noise, no visual path.  it had actually appeared for a minute or two as if they were playing with each other: i have no frame of reference for any physical object to be able to chase another by "blinking" & appearing next to it, or for a physical object to be able to change direction without slowing or curving in its flight path.  i can't explain what we saw, it doesn't fit with anything else i've seen. i wish i had gone into the house and gotten a video camera.
content.summary: Multiple triangular craft, unrealistically changing course, super bright comet flash

content.detailedDescription: A loud boom that shook a 100 mile radius is currently unexplained by both law enforcement and military, the same thing happened a few years ago and was a cover up, this te the national weather service saw a cloud of debris 1000 feet in the air at the time of the explosion but it currently remains a mystery, to hear the story search unexplained boom in shreveport
content.summary: Sonic boom was hear by entire city still unexplained find article online, shreveport, la news
